title: Tajmahal
description: Tajmahal meaning "Crown of Palaces" is a mausoleum in Agra, India commissioned by Mughal emperor Shah Jahan. Also one among Seven wonders of world. On the other hand, Tajmahal is turning into yellowish-brown color due to air pollution.
story: Think dirt on bottom of pond in image as air pollution, and the muddy reflection is a present state of Tajmahal.
